dcterms:description: CODA is a real-world road corner case dataset with 10K driving scenes, spanning more than 40 classes, designed for object detection in autonomous driving.
dcterms:title: CODA

dcterms:creator: D. Hendrycks
S. Basart
M. Mazeika
M. Mostajabi
J. Steinhardt
D. Song
dcterms:description: StreetHazards is a synthesized dataset where corner cases are simulated via graphics, providing a benchmark for anomaly segmentation.
dcterms:title: StreetHazards

dcterms:creator: T. Qian
J. Chen
L. Zhuo
Y. Jiao
Y.-G. Jiang
dcterms:description: nuScenes-QA is a multi-modal visual question answering benchmark for autonomous driving scenarios, constructed with 460K question-answer pairs based on object attributes and relationships.
dcterms:title: nuScenes-QA

dcterms:creator: J. Kim
A. Rohrbach
T. Darrell
J. Canny
Z. Akata
dcterms:description: BDD-X focuses on providing textual explanations for self-driving vehicles, enhancing the interpretability of autonomous driving systems.
dcterms:title: BDD-X

dcterms:creator: S. Malla
C. Choi
I. Dwivedi
J. H. Choi
J. Li
dcterms:description: DRAMA is a dataset that focuses on joint risk localization and captioning in driving scenarios, providing insights into critical targets and driving advice.
dcterms:title: DRAMA

dcterms:creator: C. Sima
K. Renz
K. Chitta
L. Chen
H. Zhang
C. Xie
P. Luo
A. Geiger
H. Li
dcterms:description: DriveLM is a dataset designed for driving with graph visual question answering, promoting end-to-end understanding of autonomous driving.
dcterms:title: DriveLM

dcterms:description: CODA-LM is a novel dataset introduced in this paper for evaluating large vision-language models on self-driving corner cases.
dcterms:title: CODA-LM
